name: DANCEnter
description:
Controls:

Movement: 'WASD' and 'Arrow Keys'
Collect Score Square: 'SPACE'
Use Ultimate Move: 'R'
Quit the Game: 'ESC'
Toggle Fullscreen: 'F11'

Gameplay:

Step on dance tiles as much as you can, then press 'SPACE'while inside the Score Square. You fail if you press to early.
Enemies will close the dance tiles, don't step on closed tiles or you'll lose score and lost a Ultimate Move point.
